category.name: Rich Client.Effectivity
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: APS_Show_Effectivity_Tabular_View
preference.preference_description: Determines whether to show the "Tabular Effectivity" view (true) or the "Range Effectivity" view (false; default value). The "Tabular Effectivity" view supports only Unit effectivities. This preference is not applicable for Date effectivities, and the "Range Effectivity" view is used.
